description: The file name AcroRD32.exe, a legitimate process name for Adobe's Acrobat Reader, was used by [APT1](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0006) as a name for malware.(Citation: Mandiant APT1)(Citation: Mandiant APT1 Appendix)
